metadata.name: Genesis I
metadata.description:
"In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth (Gen 1,1);"

"God said: Let there be light. And there was light. (Gen 1,3)"

This is the first work of the series "The Genesis". For me personally it is the creation of a new world.
The scanner captures and digitizes reality. The Genesis from a computer perspective.

Original artwork by tillmannos_, Genesis I, 100cm x 100cm, 300dpi, Scanography, 2021
